content:encoded:
The Story of the guide and interpreter, (Sacajawea), who helped the Lewis and Clark Expedition negotiate with the Shoshone and explore the Louisiana Territory.

Original Air Date: March 08, 1953
Host: Andrew Rhynes
Show: Western Stories
Phone: (707) 98 OTRDW (6-8739)

Stars:
• Lurene Tuttle
• Whitfield Connor
• Lamont Johnson
• John Stephenson
• Ben Wright
• Ted de Corsia
• Frank Martin

Host:
• Lionel Barrymore

Exit music from: Roundup on the Prairie by Aaron Kenny https://bit.ly/3kTj0kK
